backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing daily orders, karigar mappings, assignments, user profiles, and blob storage with access‑controlled CRUD methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence for PDF.js loading and karigar mapping UX improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files, describing key components, hooks, pages, parsers, and utilities.
frontend/ic-assets.json5: Asset rules configuring caching behavior, disabling cache for index.html and enabling long‑term caching for other assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global background and border utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS and PDF.js from CDNs and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with header, sidebar navigation, tabs for orders and mapping, and build ID display.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, loading, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file placeholder for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: A dialog UI for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory using a mutation hook.
Provides an export button that generates factory-level HTML output for the selected factory’s orders.
Groups factory orders by assigned karigar, supports filtering, viewing, and exporting karigar-specific PDFs.
Displays a sidebar list of factories with order counts and allows selecting a factory for viewing.
Empty or placeholder file with no implemented logic.
Renders a selectable orders table showing design, generic name, and assignment details using mapping and assignment data.
Provides search and design-based sorting controls for the orders list.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Daily orders upload page with parsing, diagnostics, filtering, sorting, saving, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses daily order spreadsheets or CSVs, detects header rows, extracts normalized order fields, and returns orders with warnings.
Parses karigar mapping files (Excel or PDF), detecting design, generic name, and karigar columns to build a normalized lookup map.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/expor: Exports parsed daily orders to an Excel file using XLSX, adding optional karigar and generic name fields.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sort functionality for daily orders, filtering by text and sorting by design.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates and downloads an HTML report grouping orders by karigar with generic names, sorted for factory-wide output.
Generates an HTML file listing a single karigar's orders with normalized design lookups for generic names.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ge: Determines deterministic sheet read order by prioritizing sheets 1, 3, and 2, then sorting remaining names.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ka: Encodes and decodes karigar mapping data to and from backend blobs, recomputing normalized design codes.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving karigar mapping workbooks with progress, errors, and summaries.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/us: Loads and decodes mapping blobs, returning total entries and ordered sheet names with error handling.
frontend/src/features/order-list/compone: Displays orders grouped by karigar with selection checkboxes and Excel export per karigar.
Renders a simple table of karigar orders with selection handling.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Displays daily orders enriched with mapping data, allowing filtering by karigar and providing diagnostics.
frontend/src/features/order-list/useKari: Decodes a mapping blob into a normalized lookup map using prioritized sheet order and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to provide simplified readiness and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating daily orders and karigar assignments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file placeholder for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type declarations for XLSX utilities on the Window object.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Formats and exposes the build timestamp, returning a human-readable build ID or raw timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/pdfjs.ts: Checks PDF.js availability and configures its worker source, providing initialization and readiness helpers.
frontend/src/utils/textNormalize.ts: Provides text normalization utilities for cleaning cell values, headers, and design codes for reliable matching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Gets, stores, and clears URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into user-friendly messages with special handling for PDF.js, network, and parsing errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing known issues, existing features, and context for fixing PDF.js loading errors.
